about_the_game:
Hover Muscle is a modern take on old school arcade racing games featuring V8 Powered "Hover" Muscle Cars, tons of customization, competitive leaderboards and a high energy Rock OST.
Race through a multitude of unique detailed environments as you master power-sliding and knowing just when to dump the juice to scream through that perfect line as the speed blurs the world away.
Show your friends and the world, who's the fastest by leaving your mark on the leaderboards.


  • 10 Unique Tracks with a reversible option for a total of 20 Tracks.
  • 10 Muscle Cars to choose from.
  • In Car and Follow Car Camera Options for all styles of player.
  • Lots of Paint and Part options (Engines, Wings, Rims, Neon, etc..) to unlock so you can build a unique car to fit your style.
  • Customize your garage to match your car with different layouts, toolbox colors, wall and floor coverings and more.
  • Original High Energy Rock OST
  • Master Power-slide and Boost for the fastest times.
  • Competitive Leaderboards so you can race for the top spot on each track.
  • Race against your best times with ghost cars or just chill and enjoy a fast focus racer.

name: Hover Muscle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Quad Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Card, NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports XBox 360 Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz (Six Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video Card Nvidia 1070 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports XBox 360 Controller

short_description: Hover Muscle is a modern take on old school arcade racing games featuring V8 Powered "Hover" Muscle Cars, tons of customization, competitive leaderboards and a high energy Rock OST.
